Package net.happybrackets.device.sensors

Class LPS25H

java.lang.Object
net.happybrackets.device.sensors.Sensor
net.happybrackets.device.sensors.LPS25H
All Implemented Interfaces:
BarometricPressureSensor
public class LPS25H
extends Sensor
implements BarometricPressureSensor
The LPS25H is the pressure sensor (barometer) on the Raspberry Pi Sensehat.
